Package Menu_package.Menus

Class AlaCarteMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Menu_package.Menus.GenericMenu
      • Menu_package.Menus.AlaCarteMenu
  • public class AlaCarteMenu
extends GenericMenu
    This class prints the Ala Carte Menu and handles processes that involves Items of the Ala Carte Menu. This class creates 3 ArrayLists of Item objects that contains Item objects of Item Category of "Main Course", "Dessert", and "Drink" respectively.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlaCarteMenu

        public AlaCarteMenu()
        Constructor of this class. Creates 3 ArrayLists of Item objects that contains Item objects of Item Category of "Main Course", "Dessert", and "Drink" respectively, using the information from the csv file (containing Menu Items' information).

    • Method Detail

      • printItemSection

        public void printItemSection​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> menuItems,
                             int spacing,
                             boolean isDrinkType)
        Prints the Items' name, price, description(excluded for types in Drink category) in the Menu, separated by their Item types using a header line. For each Item, price and description(excluded for types in Drink category) of Item is printed right and below of the Item name respectively. This method is only used for Item type that do not belong to Set category.
        Parameters:
        menuItems - List of Item objects
        spacing - Used to format the positioning of the displayed words and header in the Menu display.
        isDrinkType - To indicate if Items in menuItems are of Drink category or not. "true" if in Drink category, "false" if not in Drink category.

      • findItemTypeCategory

        public java.lang.String findItemTypeCategory​(java.lang.String itemType)
        Returns the Category name of an Item type. (e.g. when itemType = "Appetiser", it will be under Main Course Category). Return "Invalid Type" if the Item type is not in any category.
        Overrides:
        findItemTypeCategory in class GenericMenu
        Parameters:
        itemType - Item type
        Returns:
        String String to indicate the Category of the Item type.
        See Also:
        findItemTypeCategory(String itemType), PromoMenu.findItemTypeCategory(String itemType)

      • allocateItem

        public int allocateItem​(Item menuItem,
                        java.lang.String itemType)
        Adds Item object into the ArrayList of Items, that contains Item objects of the same category.
        Overrides:
        allocateItem in class GenericMenu
        Parameters:
        menuItem - Item object to be added
        itemType - Item type of the Item object
        Returns:
        int Return 1 to indicate Item object has been added, -1 to indicate Item object is not added
        See Also:
        allocateItem(Item menuItem, String itemType), PromoMenu.allocateItem(Item menuItem, String itemType)

      • findFirstTypeOccurrence

        public int findFirstTypeOccurrence​(java.lang.String typeCategory,
                                   java.lang.String itemType)
        Find the first occurrence of an Item type (e.g. Appetiser) in the ArrayList of Items. The ArrayList contains the Items of the Category, that Item type is under. This method is used in the proccess of deleting/updating an Item's information.
        Overrides:
        findFirstTypeOccurrence in class GenericMenu
        Parameters:
        typeCategory - Category the Item type is under
        itemType - Item type, to find the first occurrence in the ArrayList
        Returns:
        int Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified Item type. Returns -2 if Item type is not in any category, -1 if Item type is in a category, but Item type is not found in the ArrayList.
        See Also:
        findFirstTypeOccurrence(String typeCategory, String itemType), PromoMenu.findFirstTypeOccurrence(String typeCategory, String itemType)

      • returnItemListReference

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> returnItemListReference​(java.lang.String typeCategory)
        This method returns the reference of ArrayList of Items (one of the attributes of this class), that contains Items that is under an Item Category specified. This method can only be used when it can be assumed that Item Category specified is always valid.
        Overrides:
        returnItemListReference in class GenericMenu
        Parameters:
        typeCategory - Item Category, of the ArrayList wanted.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Item objects ArrayList of Item that contains Items under the specified Item category.
